name: Ext_R5_ClinicalImpression_fi_item
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ClinicalImpression.finding.item for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ClinicalImpression.finding.item from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClinicalImpression|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Specific text, code or reference for finding or diagnosis, which may include ruled-out or resolved conditions.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.finding.item` maps to R4B `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemCodeableConcept`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ClinicalImpression.finding.item` maps to R4B `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Specific text, code or reference for finding or diagnosis, which may include ruled-out or resolved conditions.
element.comment: `ClinicalImpression.finding.item` maps to R4B `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemCodeableConcept`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ClinicalImpression.finding.item` maps to R4B `ClinicalImpression.finding.itemReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Identification of the Condition or diagnosis.
